title: I have a lower vocal range and I’m trying to audition for JYP, what are some songs that I should sing? - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘Way Back Home' -Shaun ‘I'm a star'- Lai Gualin ‘L.O.V.E' and ‘360’ -Park Jihoon ‘Love Scenario’ -Ikon ‘Inner Child' -BTS V ‘Really Really' and ‘So So' -Winner ‘Going Crazy’ - Treasure13 ‘Ring Ring' -Kim Youngchul ‘I like That' -Lee Jinhyuk ‘Nothing Holding me back’ -Shawn Mendez ‘Young Blood' -5 sec of summer
Pick the song that you can connect and change the key. Being able sing comfortably with nice tone should do.
